channel.title: Need help with a simple code

item.title: Need help with a simple code
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“mrdrzj, post:2, topic:410748”]if before if (npcs.npcType == 3491) there was any other monster that drops an item or whatever did u add break; before if (npcs.npcType == 3491)
because sometims that happens i made when u kill a monster you get colored whips and stuff and forgot to put break; so every monster dropped same thing and said same sendmessage:
You have gotten a colored whip![/quote]
WHAT?!?!?!? There is no switch statement for the dropitems method.

It should look like this.

item.title: Need help with a simple code
item.dc:creator: @merk_u_zerk merk u zerk
item.description:
@merk_u_zerk wrote:

     if (npcs.npcType == 134)
     c.getItems().addItem(19864,10);

     if (npcs.npcType == 132)
     c.getItems().addItem(19864,15);

     if (npcs.npcType == 95)
     c.getItems().addItem(19864,20);

     if (npcs.npcType == 491)
     c.getItems().addItem(19864,30);

     if (npcs.npcType == 412)
     c.getItems().addItem(19864,35);

     if (npcs.npcType == 27)
     c.getItems().addItem(19864,40);

     if (npcs.npcType == 175)
     c.getItems().addItem(19864,45);

     if (npcs.npcType == 799)
     c.getItems().addItem(19864,50);

     if (npcs.npcType == 2245)
     c.getItems().addItem(19864,60);

     if (npcs.npcType == 1472)
     c.getItems().addItem(19864,150);

     if (npcs.npcType == 3491)
     c.getItems().addItem(7462,28);
     for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) {
     for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) {
     c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000);
                                             }
                                     }

Thats what i have the rock crab id isnt in any one of those, i kill one and it does it.

item.title: Need help with a simple code
item.dc:creator: @merk_u_zerk merk u zerk
item.description:
@merk_u_zerk wrote:

Well i have a simple code but its designed for only 1 monster but when i kill any monster it banks all items And it spawns the gloves or w.e But, i had this code working before so nothing is wrong with the code except it does it for ever monster 

		if (npcs[i].npcType == 3491)
		c.getItems().addItem(7462,28);
		for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) {
		for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) {
		c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000);
                                    			}
                            			}

Read full topic
